review: A nice substitute for who do not have a Smart Tv
author: Marco

review: How the heck did I not have Apple TV and Netflix until two months ago?  For $100 you can't go wrong with this device (or an Amazon Fire for that matter).  I chose this because I already have a MacBook that can sync super easily to it.  Netflix is a no brainer, but I also love the PBS Channel (Frontline and other great programming) and like I said the syncing capabilities.  I've cut the cable and use this as my primary form of entertainment (a growing class of people are doing this for a myriad of reasons).  To be honest, what is the point of having cable anymore if this little device can solve a lot of your entertainment needs?It's also very easy to set-up and I'd recommend the AmazonBasics HDMI cable as well.  Don't buy expensive cables.  They all do the same thing no matter what anyone tells you.
author: memory_tape
